FuncDef: This command enters the context to add a static multicast group as a (*, G) or as one or more (S,G) records. When a static MLD or IGMP group is added, multicast data for that (*,G) or (S,G) is forwarded to the specific SAP or SDP without receiving any membership report from a host.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IGMP multicast group address that receives data on an interface. The IP address must be unique for each static group.
Specifies an MLD multicast group address that receives data on an interface. The IP address must be unique for each static group. Values-ipv6-address:.
